attributes.action: replace God Save the Queen with the Imperial March theme from The Empire Strikes Back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: God Save the Queen is a funereal dirge that needs replacing with an anthem with some proper martial music and something to instil a bit of pride. What better than one of John Williams' masterpieces, The Imperial March?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
